author: Andrew J. Hawkins
title: General Motors announces electric versions of the Chevy Equinox and Blazer SUVs
description: GM announced it will produce electric versions of the Chevy Equinox and Blazer SUVs by 2023. The Equinox EV will sell for $30,000.

title: Apple, LiveOne, Tesla - Reuters
description: The S&P 500 was on track to open at all-time highs on Tuesday, building on a record-setting rally amid thin trading volumes, with investors unshaken by Omicron-driven travel disruptions and store closures.

title: Tesla, McDonald's, Wolfspeed - Reuters
description: Futures tracking the S&P 500 neared record levels on Monday as Wall Street looked to extend a recovery from the pandemic shock into the new year, while shares in heavyweight Tesla jumped after the electric carmaker posted bumper delivery numbers.

title: LiveOne, Tesla, ADDvantage Technologies - Reuters
description: The S&P 500 hovered around record highs on Tuesday as conviction in the U.S. economy helped investors shrug off concerns over Omicron-driven travel disruptions and store closures, and extended Wall Street's four-day rally amid thin trading volumes.

title: Tesla, RR Donnelley, Kroger - Reuters
description: The blue-chip Dow hit an all-time high on Thursday, extending a record-setting run as a dip in weekly jobless claims allayed fears over the economic damage from a rampant surge in COVID-19 infections in the United States.
